conflicts.description: hdf-eos5: At least one of +static or +shared must be set
conflicts.name: ~static

dependencies.description:
GNU Make is a tool which controls the generation of executables and
other non-source files of a program from the program's source files.
dependencies.name: gmake

dependencies.description:
The GNU config.guess and config.sub scripts versioned by timestamp.
This package can be used as a build dependency for autotools packages
that ship a tarball with outdated config.guess and config.sub files.
dependencies.name: gnuconfig

dependencies.description:
HDF5 is a data model, library, and file format for storing and managing
data. It supports an unlimited variety of datatypes, and is designed for
flexible and efficient I/O and for high volume and complex data.
dependencies.name: hdf5

dependent_to.description:
NCL is an interpreted language designed specifically for scientific data
analysis and visualization. Supports NetCDF 3/4, GRIB 1/2, HDF 4/5, HDF-
EOD 2/5, shapefile, ASCII, binary. Numerous analysis functions are
built-in.
dependent_to.name: ncl

description:
HDF-EOS (Hierarchical Data Format - Earth Observing System) is a self-
describing file format based upon HDF for standard data products that
are derived from EOS missions. HDF-EOS5 is based upon HDF5.
name: hdf-eos5

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system

variants.description: Build shared libraries (can be used with +static)
variants.name: shared

variants.description: Build shared libraries (can be used with +shared)
variants.name: static
